title: 四本《Minecraft》实体书现在可以购买啦！
author: 虚伪寂寞
txt_content:
本帖最后由 虚伪寂寞 于 2014-5-22 21:25 编辑 

10月10日，让粉丝们期待已久的两本《Minecraft》实体书即将上市，这两本书分别为《我的世界新手手册》（The Minecraft Beginner’s Handbook）以及《我的世界年鉴》（The Minecraft Annual）。根据开发商的说法，前者主要包括了“玩家在游戏中头几天要存活下来所必须知道的一些事情”，而后者则是关于如何制造一些很酷的东西。

接下来，在十一月份，另一本关于《我的世界》的书《我的世界红石手册》（The Minecraft Redstone Handbook）也将上市
发行商Egmont表示，他们将会把实体书搞得像游戏中的书本一样，封面样图如下：

明年二月份，在亚马逊上，还会有另外两本《我的世界》手册上市，一本是关于战斗的，而另一本则是关于建设的。如果这些书销量好的话，估计之后还会有更多类似的书上市。
PS：楼主希望有中文版发售！！！
已经能在http://minecraft.egmont.co.uk/ pre-order了. .

Official Minecraft books due this year
Four beginner's handbooks due in September, followed by an annual

Clearly aimed at introducing beginners to the blocky intricacies of Mojang's world, the first four handbooks will have the following titles: The Beginner's Handbook, The Redstone Handbook, The Combat Handbook and The Construction Handbook. These will be followed by a Minecraft Annual, poster book, and a magazine.

While those of you who know exactly how to go about surviving in a new world, killing Endermen and constructing Redstone circuits may not be particularly thrilled by the prospect of those how-to guides, David Riley, Managing Director of Egmont's licensed character division claims that "There really is something to satisfy both eager beginners and expert fans, with even more titles coming next year."

The handbooks are to be published by UK publisher Egmont, and have been written with input from both Mojang and dedicated fans. Aimed at children aged nine and up, these first four books will retail for ￡5.99.

What tips would have been useful for you when you were starting out? Could you find the advice you needed online? And what guides would you find helpful now?

来源:  OXM UK 经由 Egmont



Official Minecraft books arrive in the UK this September
By Jared Miller– Posted on March 28, 2013Posted in: News


This September, Minecraft builds its empire by venturing into the world of print with the help of UK publishing house Egmont. The new line of officially licensed books will launch with four handbooks designed to entertain and educate beginners and experts alike. The books include: The Beginner’s Handbook, The Redstone Handbook, The Combat Handbook, and The Construction Handbook–each title is fairly self-explanatory in what readers will find between the covers.
Egmont hopes to offer engaging books that introduce readers to the world-building game in a unique format while also offering exclusive material from Mojang not available online. After the first set of handbooks, there will be a Minecraft Annual, Minecraft Poster Book, and an All About Minecraft Magazine. Additional titles in the series are planned for next year.

While no US release has been announced, the four handbooks will retail in the UK for ￡5.99 this September, with the annual and poster book following, costing ￡7.99 and ￡9.99 respectively. If you haven’t played Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition, you can download the demo here.

来源：xblafans 经由 OXM UK 经由 Egmont
